title: Predestined Hearts
description: Love and a sense of belonging is all Ashlin Thomas dreams about. Greed and power took that away. Ripped away by tragedy, the one person left in her life was taken.How does someone move on from so much loss? When words spoken from the past allow Ashlin to grasp the future she desires, the harsh reality of life threatens to take it away. Will she sacrifice one love for another?*Previously released as Predestined Hearts
author: Kelly Elliott
